title: New: ESS SEE – Touch Me
body:
Really sultry, sensual yet slightly raw edged pop here from Brooklyn’s **ESS SEE** on her debut single, _Touch Me_.

Kind of like BANKS raised on Nirvana or Sonic Youth, whilst still harbouring some of the knack for finding a killer hook. Check it below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
